channel.title: Issue with "We've got hostiles" level (Steam) (Resolved)
channel.description:
Hi
My issue regards the entirety of the level. I cannot load any savegames I make in this level, I also cannot start the level from the "new game" option even though it's unlocked.
I have replayed from a save in "office complex" and the issue persists. Savegame screenshots are blacked out in the savegame list. Screenshot below.

item.title: Issue with "We've got hostiles" level (Steam) (Resolved)
item.dc:creator: kaiwano
item.description:
Seems the issue was not with the level, rather with the remaining disk space on the partition where Black Mesa places its savegames.

Read full topic

item.title: Issue with "We've got hostiles" level (Steam) (Resolved)
item.dc:creator: kaiwano
item.description:
I made it to the first loading screen on that level. Game just crashed. It is unplayable for me like this any help would be appreciated.

Read full topic

item.title: Issue with "We've got hostiles" level (Steam) (Resolved)
item.dc:creator: kaiwano
item.description:
Seems I also have an issue with uploading screenshot.

Read full topic
